subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which Mughal Emperor ruled Rajasthan between 16th and 17th century?
question_hi: 16वें से 17वें के दशकों में राजस्थान में चंद्रपूर्वा सम्मान कैलेंडरणी के अधिकार थे।
explanation_en: Krishnadevaraya was the ruler of Vijayanagara Empire during the 16th century and ruled Rajasthan as a part of his empire.
